ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I got a lot more experience as a director and had to be more self-reflective about what I was doing, both of which were very helpful.

I learned a lot of practical knowledge about lighting, sound, and camerawork.
I also developed my skills in writing and storyboarding scripts.

I got a lot more hands-on experience with technical filmmaking skills ranging from setting up lighting to editing sound in post-production. I also gained a lot of experience with storyboarding and scriptwriting.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: It is an amazing experience to practice being a director. We don't get as much training on working with actors as I might have liked, and the story development ends up being a little weak, both of which he said he would work on for next year.

Weaknesses:
The scenes became a little overwhelming to organize at times. Also finding actors was difficult.

Strengths
Intimate space with a lot of attention on developing practical skills
The class is long, so come with your best attention span. That said, you get a lot of feedback and learn how to improve, which is very helpful.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: If you're interested in filmmaking this class is a must. You learn a ton from Jon, and get to really hone your craft, which is great.
I would definitely recommend this class to another student if they would like to learn more about film writing and directing.
I would recommend this class if you want to learn more about the craft of filmmaking and get hands-on experience in an array of areas within the art.
